data.name: Hawaiian Pizza
data.description: Our classic Hawaiian pizza is a delicious combination of tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, ham, pineapple, and red onion, topped with bacon, jalapeno peppers, bell peppers, mushrooms, olives, pepperoni, Canadian bacon, and sweet corn. With gluten-free and vegan options available, there's something for everyone to enjoy!

data.name: Pepperoni Pizza
data.description: Our classic pepperoni pizza features a savory tomato sauce and melty mozzarella cheese, topped with zesty slices of pepperoni. With gluten-free and dairy-free options available, it's the perfect choice for any pizza lover!

data.name: Margherita Pizza
data.description: Our delicious margherita pizza features a classic combination of tangy tomato sauce, creamy mozzarella cheese, and fragrant fresh basil. With gluten-free, vegan, and dairy-free options available, it's the perfect choice for any pizza lover!

data.name: Vegetarian Pizza
data.description: Our tasty vegetarian pizza features a rich tomato sauce and stretchy mozzarella cheese, topped with fresh veggies including red onion, bell peppers, mushrooms, and olives. With gluten-free, vegetarian, and kosher options available, it's a great choice for anyone looking for a delicious meat-free meal!

data.name: Meat Lovers Pizza
data.description: Our indulgent meat lovers pizza is loaded with all your favorite meats, including zesty pepperoni, savory sausage, crispy bacon, and tender ham, all atop a bed of rich tomato sauce and melty mozzarella cheese. With halal options available, it's a great choice for anyone craving a hearty, meaty pizza!

data.name: Chicken Alfredo Pizza
data.description: This Chicken Alfredo Pizza is a delicious combination of creamy Alfredo sauce, tender grilled chicken, fresh spinach, and mushrooms on a crispy crust. It's also gluten-free, dairy-free, and low-carb, making it a great option for those with dietary restrictions.

data.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
data.description: This BBQ Chicken Pizza is a crowd-pleaser with tangy BBQ sauce, juicy grilled chicken, crispy bacon, and spicy jalapeno peppers on a gluten-free, dairy-free, and paleo-friendly crust.

data.name: Four Cheese Pizza
data.description: This Four Cheese Pizza is a cheesy delight with tomato sauce, mozzarella, ricotta, parmesan, and gorgonzola cheeses on a gluten-free and vegetarian crust.

data.name: Buffalo Chicken Pizza
data.description: This Buffalo Chicken Pizza is a spicy treat with buffalo sauce, grilled chicken, red onions, and jalapeno peppers on a gluten-free and dairy-free crust.

data.name: Supreme Pizza
data.description: This Supreme Pizza is loaded with toppings like pepperoni, sausage, red onions, bell peppers, mushrooms, and olives on a kosher crust with tomato sauce and mozzarella cheese.

data.name: Bacon Cheeseburger Pizza
data.description: This Bacon Cheeseburger Pizza is a delicious twist on a classic with ketchup and mustard as the sauce, ground beef, crispy bacon, tangy pickles, and red onions on a dairy-free crust with mozzarella cheese.

data.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
data.description: A classic Italian dish made with spaghetti, pancetta, egg yolks, parmesan cheese, and black pepper. This dish is known for its creamy texture and savory taste.

data.name: Penne Arrabiata
data.description: A spicy pasta dish made with penne pasta, tomato sauce, red pepper flakes, garlic, and olive oil. This dish has a bold flavor and is perfect for those who enjoy a little heat in their food.

data.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
data.description: A rich and creamy pasta dish made with fettuccine pasta, heavy cream, butter, and parmesan cheese. This classic Italian dish is a favorite for those who love a comforting and indulgent meal.

data.name: Shrimp Scampi
data.description: A delicious pasta dish made with linguine pasta, shrimp, garlic, white wine, butter, and lemon juice. This dish is light and flavorful, perfect for those who enjoy seafood and citrus flavors.

data.name: Penne alla Vodka
data.description: A creamy and flavorful pasta dish made with penne pasta, tomato sauce, vodka, heavy cream, and garlic. This dish has a subtle sweetness and is perfect for those who enjoy a twist on classic tomato-based pasta dishes.

data.name: Pesto Linguine
data.description: A classic pasta dish featuring linguine tossed in a homemade basil pesto sauce, made with pine nuts, garlic, and parmesan cheese. A vegetarian option that is both flavorful and filling.

data.name: Bucatini all'Amatriciana
data.description: A traditional Italian pasta dish with bucatini noodles served in a spicy tomato sauce made with pancetta, onion, and red pepper flakes. This dairy-free option is perfect for those who prefer a touch of heat in their pasta.

data.name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
data.description: A simple yet flavorful vegan pasta dish featuring spaghetti tossed in a garlic and olive oil sauce with a hint of red pepper flakes and parsley for a touch of freshness.

data.name: Rigatoni alla Norma
data.description: A vegetarian pasta dish with rigatoni noodles served in a tomato sauce with sautéed eggplant and topped with crumbled ricotta salata cheese and fresh basil.

data.name: Lasagna Bolognese
data.description: A classic lasagna recipe featuring layers of lasagna noodles, a hearty meat sauce made with ground beef and tomato sauce, and a creamy béchamel sauce. Topped with a blend of ricotta, mozzarella, and parmesan cheeses, this dish is perfect for those looking for a comforting, kosher option.

data.name: Garlic Bread
data.description: Toasted baguette slices rubbed with garlic and butter, topped with fresh parsley.

data.name: French Fries
data.description: Crispy fried potatoes, seasoned with salt and served hot.

data.name: Bruschetta
data.description: Toasted baguette slices topped with chopped tomatoes, garlic, olive oil, and fresh basil.

data.name: Fried Calamari
data.description: Breaded and fried calamari rings served with lemon wedges.

data.name: Chicken Wings
data.description: Crispy chicken wings tossed in a spicy sauce made with hot sauce, butter, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper.

data.name: Buffalo Wings
data.description: Crispy chicken wings tossed in a spicy sauce made with hot sauce, butter, garlic powder, paprika, salt, and black pepper, served with blue cheese dressing and celery sticks.

data.name: Caesar Salad
data.description: A classic Caesar salad with crisp romaine lettuce, crunchy croutons, and tangy parmesan cheese, tossed with a creamy Caesar dressing.

data.name: Caprese Salad
data.description: A refreshing Caprese salad with ripe tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, fragrant basil, and a drizzle of olive oil and balsamic glaze.

data.name: Cobb Salad
data.description: A hearty Cobb salad with grilled chicken, crispy bacon, hard-boiled eggs, creamy avocado, juicy tomatoes, tangy blue cheese, and a side of ranch dressing.

data.name: Greek Salad
data.description: A flavorful Greek salad with crisp romaine lettuce, crunchy cucumbers, juicy tomatoes, sharp feta cheese, briny kalamata olives, and a tangy Greek dressing.

data.name: Coca-Cola
data.description: Classic carbonated beverage with a sweet and refreshing taste.

data.name: Lemonade
data.description: Refreshing drink made with lemon juice, sugar, and water.

data.name: Iced Tea
data.description: Refreshing drink made with tea and served over ice.

data.name: Hot Chocolate
data.description: Hot and rich drink made with cocoa powder, milk, and sugar.

data.name: Espresso
data.description: Strong and concentrated coffee served in a small shot.

data.name: Mojito
data.description: Refreshing cocktail made with rum, lime juice, mint leaves, and soda water.

data.name: Milkshake
data.description: Thick and creamy drink made with milk, ice cream, and flavored syrup.

data.name: Sparkling Water
data.description: Carbonated water with a crisp and refreshing taste.

data.name: Apple Cider
data.description: Warm and spicy drink made with apple juice, cinnamon, and other spices.

data.name: Orange Juice
data.description: Freshly squeezed juice made with oranges and served cold.
